Thanks Laurent.

I managed to get up and running yesterday by doing the following.  I'm posting this, in case people have issues with Nugent, which I haven't tried.  

+ I the downloaded V3 SP1 zip from here: http://mvvmlight.codeplex.com/releases/view/60473

+ Unzip GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Templates.V3.VS10.zip and place your dev language's ItemTemplates and ProjectTemplates .zip file under \My Documents\Visual Studio 2010\Templates then the appropriate directory under both ItemTemplates and ProjectTemplates.

+ Unzip GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Binaries.V3.zip and place the "Laurent Bugnion (GalaSoft)" directory in your "Program Files" directory.

+ Start Visual Studio, and you should be able to create a MVVM Light project, and add MVVM items.
